citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:50 pm on
11-Dec-19.
I spoke with licensee via phone. She was out of town and not able to return within an hour.
